p: Wistar rats ( n = 57) were used in this study, obtained from the Central Animal Facility of the State University of Maringa—UEM, Brazil—each weighing approximately 150 g. The rats were kept in polyacrylic cages in a well-aerated environment with a controlled temperature of 22 ± 2.0 °C, photoperiod of 12 h, with free access to food and water throughout the experiment. All the rats were maintained for 15 days of acclimatization prior to any experimental procedure.
